Zahle is located at an altitude of almost 1000 meters, at the end of the Beqaa Valley.

value: Enjoy a leisurely meal at one of the city's numerous restaurants.
content=A well known restaurant with a panoramic view of the city.
content=A nice place to eat Lebanese cuisine, which offers views of the whole city.  This restaurant has the only rotating platform in Zahle.
content=A pastry shop that is part of a well known chain that originated in Zahle.

, is a well known area for strolling, eating and arcade activities. Restaurants in this area typically offer a traditional mezze and mechoui menu. Dining is primarily outdoors in a pleasant setting next to the river. The area is typically more comfortable, even on hot days, due to the cooling effect of the river and the shade in the valley. In addition to typical restaurants, there are ice-cream cafes.
is a five star hotel situated on the Berdawni river.
